title: Cant log in to my eueu acc.
body: When i try to log in to my acc it says - An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us. Please help me i cant do anything about this error ...

replies.body: This can happen if your network is getting blocked or having issues reaching the authentication server.  Try out each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and clear that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I updated my computer and did everything nothing works :( ... It happened right after updating to 7.14 .

Sorry to hear this is still happening.  :(  In this case download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look in your ticket, and help you directly.  We'll see you there!
